\doxysection{LOCO\+\_\+\+CONFIG Class Reference}
\hypertarget{class_l_o_c_o___c_o_n_f_i_g}{}\label{class_l_o_c_o___c_o_n_f_i_g}\index{LOCO\_CONFIG@{LOCO\_CONFIG}}


Static class to hold configuration values for the particle filter. Generally, these values are a good starting point and will work in most use cases, but that can also be changed as needed.  




{\ttfamily \#include $<$config.\+h$>$}

static constexpr size\+\_\+t {\bfseries LINE\+\_\+\+SENSOR\+\_\+\+THRESHOLD} = 2000
\begin{DoxyCompactList}\small\item\em Sensor threshold for determining if the line sensor is over a line. This is a good value at approximately 7mm from the tiles, which we found was a good balance between packaging and sensor SNR. \end{DoxyCompactList}\item

\begin{DoxyCompactList}\small\item\em Distance from the CENTER of the line to predict the value to be positive. Largely untested, but upon more testing this value will be updated appropriately. \end{DoxyCompactList}\item

\doxysubsection{Detailed Description}
Static class to hold configuration values for the particle filter. Generally, these values are a good starting point and will work in most use cases, but that can also be changed as needed.
